website_summaries.verdict: The classic profile has undergone another makeover to suit the contemporary market. The Keds Champion Shirting displays all the heritage elements with a cottony shirting upper material for the modern look. This variation adds freshness and color to any casual ensemble without sacrificing comfort, lightness, and durability.Its insufficient arch support and narrowness did not hamper many reviewers to recommend this to their peers. Found at a price point that is easy on the pocket, this is a must-have for ladies who want to look stylishly comfortable.
pros: The Keds Champion Shirting is available at an affordable price point
Buyers can choose from multiple colorways offered in the market
Majority of the purchasers praised this fun looking footwear
Most of the reviewers applauded the superb comfortable stride with this model
Many recommended this for all-day wearing
Most reviewers commended the lightness of the Keds Champion Shirting
Few mentioned about the flexible rubber outsole
Several users highly recommended this shoe to their peers
Some purchasers shared that they received compliments while wearing this sneaker
A handful described the versatility of this sneaker
They shared that they could practically wear this from running errands to a casual night out on the town
cons: Few critics mentioned about the poor arch support of the Keds Champion Shirting
Some users found this sneaker flimsy because of its unreliable durability
A handful of reviewers complained about the tad narrow width of this kick

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Keds for the real 6 and a half size.....so hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable Keds tennis shoe! This is actually a true fit. It is so hard to find a real 6 and a half in a tennis shoe, but this one is! So many shoe makers say their shoe is a 6 and a half, but they are selling a 6 in its place. So happy to find this!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style!
customer_reviews.text: I know that Keds fit me well, so these shoes fit as expected and I love the slightly bumpy material. They are a fun shoe that still does not draw too much attention. Despite not much arch support and having high arches, I have no problem wearing them all day at work, and I stand for about half of the day. Currently at 8+ months pregnant, this is a big deal to me. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this pair of keds. They were listed as medium but width is way too tight. The fabric is very pretty but can't wear them. I have blisters on my bunions. I have been wearing keds for years and this never happened before. I think they are rejects.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: I ❤keds
customer_reviews.text: I got my new keds today an there very cute they fit great an there very comfy..an i got an awsome deal at 23 bucks i have about 50 prs now an im lookin fwd 2 my next pr
customer_reviews.author: Dude an babe

customer_reviews.title: but the times I have worn them they have been comfortable and no problems at all with the fit
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't worn them all day so I can't say that with certainty, but the times I have worn them they have been comfortable and no problems at all with the fit.That was for the 8 1/2. I also ordered a nine for my daughter but she didn't need more shoes so kept myself. Nines are a bit large but wear them nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for mom, she loves them. They fit and felt just like her other 5 pairs of women's keds.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I buy my daughter-in-law a pair of kids every year for Christmas and she loved them
customer_reviews.author: Mia Farland

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight summer shoe.  Seersucker type fabric.
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 70 year old mother who loves keds. They are very lightweight and comfortable for the summer. The fabric is a kinda like a seersucker which is kinda unusual in a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Betta FishTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers are comfortable but slightly bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are comfortable but slightly bigger than expected. My experience with Keds is that they usually run small. The insoles are very soft, and the pattern on the shoe is pretty enough to match any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: gbggg

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: A little too summery for when I bought them, but overall- LOVE these shoes. so comfortable and casual. Love them with dresses or jeans. Great for even being on your feet all day. I will say, they take a little bit to break in- but after that, SO comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked Keds. Just as good as they always were
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Keds. Just as good as they always were. I add inserts for a little arch support and can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: They're keds,cute little bo-bo sneakers to wear around the house ,on errands or for a casual night out on the town.A fashion step above athletic shoes..They are not super supportive ,not meant for the girls morning walking club or a run.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear like bedroom shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. I wish I had ordered more pairs at the sale price I bought them at. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Super well made!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how perfectly they fit! That have very comfy arch support (delicate and cushiony). My first thought in putting them on was to buy several more pairs in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds, but not liking this style as well , but the quality if very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for the price I little wide but I guess that is what a medium shoe is
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too big and didn't care for the checkered fabric, which I didn't see online. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had 'Keds' since I was 12 and am happy to find them as fun, sturdy, comfortable and 'go anywhere with ease.
customer_reviews.author: JILL A.

customer_reviews.title: I like them, great
customer_reviews.text: I like them, great, cute shoes. I always get compliments on them. I have worn them for 8 hours on concrete, not the best idea but they don't hurt my feet that much
customer_reviews.author: Chester_s26

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after four months
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these shoes for right at four months and they are already falling apart. The rubber on the side of the shoe and the fabric and sole are separating from each other, mainly at the point where my foot bends at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these exact shoes twice. I loved the first pair so much, and wore them so often, that after a year they'd been torn to shreds. I made it about 2 months after throwing away that first pair before I caved and bought another. They fit great for narrow feet, and go well with everything because their pattern is both fun and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Unfortunately, even with inserts they are too large.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: Not enough comfort for my feet, but they may be great for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I wear a lot of black/white and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are just what I wanted- I wear a lot of black/white and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: grannie 12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I plan to get more Keds! The best sneaker I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Irishwoman61

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these sneakers. I can only wear them a few hours. Too flat and not enough support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run big!!
customer_reviews.text: These ran large, even though I ordered the same size for 2 pairs. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Borland

customer_reviews.title: Love the checks and the classic style
customer_reviews.text: These are darling especially with cut and knotted shoe strings, so you don't have to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Lin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second one.. Good quality and comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Etka24

customer_reviews.title: COMFY AND CUTE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE KEDS. THIS SHOE IS COMFY AND CUTE. GREAT WITH CASUAL CLOTHES.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes. From the picture I thought these shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes. From the picture I thought these shoes were tan and a light pink but they are just tan.
customer_reviews.author: Kramazon

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: cute shoes. decently comfortable but not especially comfy look really nice
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and have good cushion and support.
customer_reviews.author: mendy holliday

customer_reviews.title: Ked's standard
customer_reviews.text: Very casual - comfortable unless you need padding or arch support. CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If any moisture is encountered, the soles become extremedy slippery.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Everyday favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the fabric and look of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Keds looked better upon receiving them, than in the ad. Like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, box was crushed and torn. Other than that, everything was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. I like the design, black and white goes with everything and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine F

customer_reviews.title: This Looked like KEDS quality!  Love the material & style.
customer_reviews.text: This is the quality we should expect from KEDS ! Love the material & style. Not sure how to UPDATE a previous Review posting, but I'll give this a try. The sneaks, as I recently posted LOOK nice. Until i walked around in them for a couple hours. For those who do not mind very flat sneaks or shoes they're a god choice. I hapen to need some arch support. These have no support. and they quickly became very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Timbuktu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes you can wear with shorts slacks or skirt. AND so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Granma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and she's in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice summer shoe. Casual but not too. Easy to wear. Nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was not as I expected they look really big on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit so well and are so so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To narrow
customer_reviews.text: In true keds style, they are cute and comfortable, just very narrow. It would be nice if they sold wide options.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: What is not to love about Keds?
customer_reviews.text: No Keds provide good arch support but they are fun and I have to have them in all colors. If you want, purchase them one half size larger and put a cushion insole in them. I find them comfortable as is.
customer_reviews.author: M.Bellish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they are cute and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Cavalieri

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Shirting Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Keds Champion Shirting is the perfect way to ring in spring! this shoe adds fresh color to any outfit. Keds has redefined women's footwear since the early 1900's. With it's quirky women's, girl's and toddler canvas and leather sneakers, Keds are the most populargo-to fashion sneakers for women of all ages. For years, Keds designs have remained simple, casual, comfortable and timeless. At Shoemagoo, you can find an full collection in every size of Keds sneakers that includes the classic white canvas style, cute and printed styles and solid colored Keds. Shop Keds boat shoes, slip-on sneakers, polka dot canvas sneakers, metallic sneakers or opt to shop for Keds snow boots for the colder seasons. At Shoemagoo you will find Keds sneakers in every size, print and style to keep your feet trendy but comfortable in the most popular women's canvas sneakers.
